name: CVE-2021-22922
description: When curl is instructed to download content using the metalink feature, thecontents is verified against a hash provided in the metalink XML file.The metalink XML file points out to the client how to get the same contentfrom a set of different URLs, potentially hosted by different servers and theclient can then download the file from one or several of them. In a serial orparallel manner.If one of the servers hosting the contents has been breached and the contentsof the specific file on that server is replaced with a modified payload, curlshould detect this when the hash of the file mismatches after a completeddownload. It should remove the contents and instead try getting the contentsfrom another URL. This is not done, and instead such a hash mismatch is onlymentioned in text and the potentially malicious content is kept in the file ondisk.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:haxx:curl:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:33:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:clustered_data_ontap:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:solidfire:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_management_node:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h300s_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h300s:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h500s_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h500s:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h700s_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h700s:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h300e_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h300e:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h500e_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h500e:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h700e_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h700e:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h410s_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h410s:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
